sentences.sentence: About 1 of every 20 Germans is acompulsive hoarder, a new study has found.
sentences.translation: 一项最新的研究发现，大约每二十个德国人中就有一个是强迫囤积者。

sentences.sentence: So printing enough money to "satisfy the hoarder" is the only way of getting interest rates or the exchange-rate down.
sentences.translation: 因此，印出足够多的钞票以“满足囤币者”，是压低利率或汇率的唯一办法。
